title: Ever have a Perfect Tower game in ARAM?
body:
A Perfect Tower game, is a match where your towers took zero damage all the way till victory.

Do you think its rare or easy?

Do you think its a feat or not?

Have you ever had one and are they harder to achieve then pentakills?

I think there are a lot of factors to think about in the situation.

Sure you got champion composition: But you need good wave clear/management. Good poke. The ability to play while outnumbered. How to cycle out deaths. All without being aced and having a single minion hit the tower once.

replies.body: Happens litterally every time i get karthus, cept maybe one time i dc'd out.
